title: Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,492 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1180L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     J and S
description: Goliath Beetles: Giant Insects provides students with a glimpse into the life of these special insects. From their anatomy to their African habitat, students will discover what makes Goliath beetles so special to the insect world.
